#summary Please post ideas for solving the 340 cipher here.

= Introduction =

This page should be used for all of those 'crazy' ideas
that we have about which tests might reveal the contents
of the cipher.

= Details =

I'd like to determine all encryption/decryption routines
that were available during the late 1950s to the mid 1970s.

One of these will be the IBM DES (Data Encryption System)
I believe it was released for production around 1975, but
had been worked on for a number of years before that as well.
